results.title: Metformin to treat Huntington disease: A pleiotropic drug against a multi-system disorder.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ to treat @DISEASE_Huntington_Disease @DISEASE_MESH:D006816 @@@Huntington disease@@@: A pleiotropic drug against a multi-system @<m>DISEASE_Congenital_Hereditary_and_Neonatal_Diseases_and_Abnormalities</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009358 @@@disorder@@@.

results.title: Metformin improves fibroblast metabolism and ameliorates arthrofibrosis in rats
results.text_hl: The metabolic modulator @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ appears to be a therapeutic candidate for @<m>DISEASE_Congenital_Hereditary_and_Neonatal_Diseases_and_Abnormalities</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009358 @@@fibrotic disorders@@@.

results.title: Therapeutic metformin concentrations positively regulate proliferation in endometrial epithelial cells via mTOR activation and augmented mitochondrial strength.
results.text_hl: ...@<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@, an antidiabetic drug, has recently been repositioned in the treatment of several @<m>DISEASE_Congenital_Hereditary_and_Neonatal_Diseases_and_Abnormalities</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009358 @@@nondiabetic disorders@@@, including @DISEASE_Reproductive_Tract_Infections @DISEASE_MESH:D060737 @@@reproductive disorders@@@ such as @DISEASE_Polycystic_Ovary_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D011085 @@@polycystic ovarian syndrome@@@, where it improves endometrial functions.

citations.NLM: Imran M, Sachdeva G, Menon S, Das D, Davuluri S, Acharya K, Chaudhari U. Therapeutic metformin concentrations positively regulate proliferation in endometrial epithelial cells via mTOR activation and augmented mitochondrial strength. Can J Physiol Pharmacol. 2023 Jan 1;101(1):52-64. PMID: 36322951

results.title: [Investigation of glycaemic and nutritional status of patients suffering from cancer.]
results.text_hl: CONCLUSION: Based on our results, targeted screening for @DISEASE_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D009369 @@@cancer@@@ among @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetic@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@, and seeking and adequately treating @<m>DISEASE_Congenital_Hereditary_and_Neonatal_Diseases_and_Abnormalities</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009358 @@@glycometabolic disorders@@@ with concomitant malignant conditions, respectively , are suggested, mainly using @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ and new non-@CHEMICAL_Insulin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D007328 @@@insulin@@@ antidiabetic medicines.

citations.NLM: Bánhegyi RJ, Veréb B, Mátrai ÁA, Rácz B, Beke S. [Investigation of glycaemic and nutritional status of patients suffering from cancer.] Orv Hetil. 2023 Jun 11;164(23):900-910. PMID: 37302126
